title: Phase 3: Implement Git Integration and Commit Trail
summary: Implement Git integration as internal Python functions and expose REST API endpoints per Cage spec (/git/status, /git/branch, /git/commit, /git/push, /git/pull, /git/merge). Enable commit trail tracking in task.provenance and integrate with Editor Tool operations for a complete, auditable workflow.

acceptance_checks.text: Git status function returns repository status
Git commit function creates commits with proper messages
Git branch functions create and manage branches
Git push and pull functions work correctly
Emit event cage.git.commit.created after successful commit
task.provenance.commits[0].sha equals `git rev-parse HEAD` and includes {sha,title,files_changed,insertions,deletions}
